sections.description: Extends the functionality of your WordPress site by adding a 'Portfolio' custom post type allowing you to organize and showcase your work or products. Companion plugin for the Mr. Tailor theme.
sections.changelog:

  • Maintenance: Various fixes and improvements were made for consistency

1.1.3

  • Small maintenance updates
